Package ohos.aafwk.ability

Class ViewsStatus

  • java.lang.Object
    • ohos.aafwk.ability.ViewsStatus
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Sequenceable

    public class ViewsStatus
extends Object
implements Sequenceable
    Obtains the view status of an AbilityForm client from the supplier.

    ViewsStatus is used in the callback method ViewListener#onTouchEvent(AbilityForm, ViewsStatus) called by the supplier to query the status of components on the client.

    Since:
    1
    SystemCapability
    SystemCapability.Aafwk#ABILITY

    • Method Detail

      • getStatusByComponentId

        public Intent getStatusByComponentId​(int componentId)
        Obtains the status of a component based on the specified component ID.

        You can obtain required information based on the keys (for example, ViewsStatus#KEY_TEXT) contained in the returned Intent object.

        Parameters:
        componentId - Identifies the component. The value cannot be a negative number.
        Returns:
        Returns the Intent object that contains component information.
        Since:
        4

      • getFullPageIntent

        public Intent getFullPageIntent​()
        Obtains the Intent for starting full page display on the supplier.

        If the supplier has called AbilityForm#registerViewListener(int, ViewListener) to listen for all click events of an AbilityForm, it will be notified upon a click event and then use this method to obtain the Intent for starting full page display. The Intent may contain special Intent parameters set by the supplier.

        Returns:
        Returns the Intent used for starting full page display.
